sentences.en: But to make money, you must be financially literate.
sentences.cn: 但是,为了赚钱, 你必须懂得财务知识.

sentences.en: Digital products regularly assume that people are technology literate.
sentences.cn: 数字产品往往假设人们非常了解技术.

sentences.en: Head teachers need to be financially literate.
Most people are literate, but some cannot read at all.
sentences.cn: 大多数的人有读写能力, 但有些人根本不能阅读.

sentences.en: Over one-quarter of the adult population are not fully literate.
sentences.cn: 四分之一以上的成年人不具备完全的读写能力。

sentences.en: Over the past ten years, 20 million have become literate.
sentences.cn: 十年来共帮助2000万妇女脱盲.

sentences.en: Some online comment cogent and literate and a lot is not.
sentences.cn: 有些网络评论令人信服、文采横溢,但很多都不是这么回事儿.

sentences.en: Standard Two: The information literate student accesses needed information effectively and efficiently.
sentences.cn: 标准 二: 有信息素养的学生可以有效地获得需要的信息.

sentences.en: The drawback of the internet is that you have to be literate to use it.
sentences.cn: 互联网的缺点就是人们必须得有文化才能使用它。

sentences.en: The German literate reversed this process with the profane French literature.
sentences.cn: 德国著作家对世俗的法国文献采取相反的作法.

sentences.en: The Greeks became more literate, more capable of recording their history and ideas.
sentences.cn: 希腊人变得更通文达理, 更有能力来记载他们的历史和思想了.

sentences.en: The old man has to ask a literate to read the letter his son wrote him.
sentences.cn: 这位老人得找个能识字的人来读儿子来的信.

sentences.en: We look for applicants who are numerate, computer-literate and energetic self-starters.
sentences.cn: 我们对求职者的要求是具备运算能力，熟练使用电脑，精力充沛而且工作积极主动。

sentences.en: We want to have more scientifically literate people running our television stations.
sentences.cn: 我们想增加一些通晓科学的人手来运作电视台。

sentences.en: You are computer literate and are familiar with software translation.
sentences.cn: 能熟练操作电脑并使用翻译软件.

sentences.en: Your children should be literate and numerate.
sentences.cn: 你的孩子应该会识字算数。

words.tran_cn: 文学的；书面的；精通文学的
缩略字；用字母代表声音或词

trans.tran_cn: 有读写能力的，有文化修养的，熟练的，通晓的
